web_dev.title: Web Development

seo.home_title: Aboubakar Sidik Faha | DevOps & Solution Architect
seo.about_desc: Learn about Aboubakar Sidik Faha, a DevOps Engineer and Software Architect with 7+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and modern software architecture based in Abidjan, Ivory Coast.
seo.services_desc: Professional DevOps and software architecture services: Cloud infrastructure, CI/CD automation, AI/ML solutions, and full-stack web development. Based in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, serving clients worldwide.
seo.projects_desc: Explore my portfolio of cloud infrastructure, DevOps automation, AI/ML solutions, and full-stack web development projects. Enterprise-grade solutions for global clients.
seo.blog_desc: Explore articles on DevOps practices, cloud architecture, software engineering, AI/ML integration, and modern development strategies. Insights from a seasoned DevOps Engineer.
seo.contact_desc: Get in touch with Aboubakar Sidik Faha for DevOps consulting, cloud architecture projects, or software development inquiries. Based in Abidjan, Ivory Coast.
